      • getCellReference

        public static java.lang.String getCellReference(int column,
                                int row)
        Converts 0-based cell coordinates into Excel style cell reference (e.g. B2).
        Parameters:
        column - 0-based column index
        row - 0-based row number
        Returns:
        cell reference (e.g. "C5" for coordinates (3,4))

      • get1904Windowing

        public static boolean get1904Windowing(org.apache.poi.xssf.eventusermodel.XSSFReader reader)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException,
                                       org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException
        Checks the source for 1904 windowing flag. This is kind of ugly, but there doesn't seem to be a better way. Method for event model.
        Parameters:
        reader -
        Returns:
        true if 1904 windowing is used, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
        org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException
